description:
Rhode Island's Premier Criminal Defense Practice
If you live in Rhode Island and face any type of criminal charge, you can turn to Marin and Barrett, Inc. for the exceptional representation you deserve. Serving clients throughout Washington County and the surrounding areas from our law office in South Kingstown, we deliver the aggressive advocacy necessary to help you protect your rights and preserve your liberties and freedom.
Solid, Trustworthy Counsel And Representation
We have achieved unprecedented success fighting on behalf of clients during their most dire times of need. A veteran of thousands of trials throughout our careers, we has developed strong, professional relationships with many of the prosecutors and judges across our region, and he can devise an effective strategy to help you achieve the best possible outcome for your situation.
Highly rated and respected by both our clients and peers alike, Attorneys Marin, Barrett, and Parrillo have received wide recognition as some of the top criminal defense attorneys in the country, and have won numerous awards and honors for their impeccable professionalism and unmatched legal skills.
Do Not Delay In Securing Your Freedom
Time is of the essence when facing criminal accusations, and you need to act quickly to increase your chances of mitigating any potential consequences you may face. For more information, you can contact the law firm Marin and Barrett, Inc., and take advantage of our law firm's free initial consultation to begin the process of securing the positive results you seek for your serious legal challenge.
